QuestData.Title: Buy Us Some Time
QuestData.Description: Many good warriors have been lost today.$b$bIf what the shaman says is true, then we must act swiftly or we will add to their numbers.$b$bThe naga are out there, scouring these waters looking for survivors.$b$bWe are not yet ready to fight, $r. You must buy us time to make preparations.$b$bFind the naga that hunt us and delay their efforts.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Zin'jatar Raiders at Legion's Fate.
QuestData.CompletionText: You give those scaly scum something to think about, $r?
QuestData.RewardText: Let us hope that your work has bought us the time we need...
